other_tests.findings: The biopsy showed an infiltrate of mononuclear inflammatory cells that extended from the mucosalâ€“submucosal junction to the skeletal muscle fibers. The overlying mucosa was focally ulcerated, with a mixed inflammatory infiltrate including histiocytes, lymphocytes, and plasma cells.
Positive at a titer of 1:64, confirming the diagnosis of syphilis.
